Class Widget

java.lang.Object
climatemonitoring.core.gui.Widget
Direct Known Subclasses:
Button, Dropdown, InputText, Panel, ResultBox, Table, Text
public class Widget extends Object
To group all the common properties of a widget

1.0-SNAPSHOT

adellafrattina
